import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MessageSquare, Smartphone, Palette, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, ArrowLeft, Wand2, Zap, Sparkles, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import axios from 'axios'; const Onboarding: React.FC = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
